name: Breadcrumb
description: A breadcrumb provides navigation context by showing the current page's location within a navigational hierarchy.

props.name: focusMode
props.description: Controls focus behavior - tab: cycles through elements with Tab key, arrow: cycles with Arrow keys

props.name: size
props.description: Controls size of breadcrumb items and dividers

subComponents.name: BreadcrumbItem
subComponents.description: Individual breadcrumb item representing a single level in the navigation hierarchy

props.name: current
props.description: Indicates the current page in the breadcrumb trail

subComponents.name: BreadcrumbButton
subComponents.description: Interactive breadcrumb item that can be clicked to navigate

props.name: onClick
props.description: Callback fired when the breadcrumb button is clicked
